an9.12:5.3.pli: Idha, sāriputta, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
an9.12:5.3.en: There’s a person who has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but has limited wisdom.

an9.12:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, idhekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
an9.12:6.1.en: Furthermore, there’s a person who has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but has limited wisdom.

an3.86:2.1.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī paññāya mattaso kārī.
an3.86:2.1.en: Take the case of a mendicant who has fulfilled their ethics, but has [38;5;121mlimited immersion and wisdom[0m.
